details:
A modern organ for play in real time or sequence, full midi configurable, can
 export live or sequence performances to MIDI file format. Maintain 500
 patterns, 100 Styles, 100  Sound Combiantion in memory. Style Library Pattern
 BD allows easy new pattern creation, can import MIDI files as patterns, input
 chords can be controlled by mouse, PC keyboard or MIDI keyboard. Sound
 edition, chord song sequencer, guided playback and extensive documentation.
